member.name: M:Rhetos.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.ExecutePlugins``1(Rhetos.Extensibility.IPluginsContainer{``0},System.String,System.String,Rhetos.Compiler.IConceptCodeGenerator)
member.param: Optional. Used to initialize generated AssemblyInfo. It will be called with IConceptInfo argument set to null.

member.name: M:Rhetos.Compiler.ICodeBuilder.AddReference(System.String)
member.summary: Use AddReferencesFromDependency to safely add reference to exact assembly, instead of using dll's short name to guess assembly version that should be used.

member.name: F:Rhetos.Compiler.TagType.Single
member.summary: Code can be inserted at the tag position only once.

member.name: F:Rhetos.Compiler.TagType.Appendable
member.summary: Code can be inserted at the tag position multiple times. New code is inserted after the previously inserted code.

member.name: F:Rhetos.Compiler.TagType.Reverse
member.summary: Code can be inserted at the tag position multiple times. New code is inserted before the previously inserted code, so that multiple insertions at the same tag will result in reversed order of the generated code.
